p: TM-align program ( https://zhanglab.ccmb.med.umich.edu/TM-align / ) was used to perform the structural alignment of PLpro, N-terminal RNA-binding Domain (NRBD) of NC, Pol/RdRp, 3CL pro, and S protein with influenza A neuraminidase (PDB ID: 3Ti6); 0.0 < TM-score < 0.30 was defined as random structural similarity, and 0.5 < TM-score < 1.00 was defined as in about the same fold [22]. The structural alignment between influenza B neuraminidase (PDB ID: 4CPY) and 3Ti6 was used as a positive control.
